ar.com.hjg.pngj
Class ImageLineHelper

java.lang.Object
  ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLineHelper

public class ImageLineHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Bunch of utility static methods to process/analyze an image line. Not essential at all.

tf_palIdx2RGB

public int[] tf_palIdx2RGB(ImageLine line,
                           PngChunkPLTE pal,
                           int[] buf)
Given an indexed line with a palette, unpacks as a RGB array

Parameters:
line - ImageLine as returned from PngReader
pal - Palette chunk
buf - Preallocated array, optional
Returns:
R G B (one byte per sample)
